title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
content: My people I just dey reason so many things for my mind. I come dey talk say if person Don hustle in Bitcoin put for potfolio may be one day person come kpai, what about the bitcointalk account wey you don suffer to build for so many years, e fit follow for inheritance? Because I know say anything wey person put him effort and time surpos dey useful to the family members. But I doubt if this one go work for this forum. Emagine growing your account for 20yrs or more, if you just kpai e don go. Because I observe say as we dey this forum eye dey watch everybody. and if somebody use you account Dem go know expecialy when your rank don high. So now wetting I dey ask be say that kind matter, how Dem dey handle am?

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Here they like certificate onto say if you go school finish and the person come kpai the certificate no get use again since the real own no dey again another person no fit use am. Na so e be for this forum I guess there are some account wey the owners don die if the forum confirm say the say the person don die them go lock the account another person no fit access am. Although unless if the account na company account wey be say na your manage dey operate am so even though you kpai the account go still in control of your manager wey dey carry am run business for you.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on October 07, 2023, 03:44:51 PMNa so e be for this forum I guess there are some account wey the owners don die if the forum confirm say the say the person don die them go lock the account another person no fit access am. I don't think there's any way to tell if the owner of such account is dead or not and that's simply because no one reveals their true identity here on Bitcointalk. The only person I think his true identity wasn't hidden here is the legendary Hal Finney, who was once a member of Bitcointalk. But since after his death his account is sometimes used by his wife to pass on important messages to bitcoin talkers or even on his social media accounts. It's very easy to tell, if an account had switched user because everyone here, has a specific posting style and when your account begins to post in a different pattern and gets noticed, it can be said to have been sold, bought or hacked by another person.here on Bitcointalk, people watch your every move so you've got to be careful. Back to op, na true talk you yarn my brother, the idea don first dey my head before now. But I no sure say person go fit do anything about that matter. Death no be watin person dey plan for, but we all know say one day we go die leave all our earthly properties for this life. Bitcointalk na one special property for many of us here as we don invest our time and knowledge take grow our account e no o good make e just waste like that when we piae. D only thing wey you fit do na to introduce some of your family to Bitcointalk so Dem go still try study and grow them account.  Apart from that nothing dey wey person go fit do. Sha make we hear from other members them.

comments.author: Roseline492
comments.body: OP just like every other people above done talk na so e be, because two people no go fit use one ID or one certificate because is only for one person and no be for two people, so to inherit account if person done go no they possible because them no they share bitcointalk account but perhaps if na other things like Bitcoin in his wallet you go fit inherit am but not not bitcointalk account.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on October 07, 2023, 03:39:05 PMSo now wetting I dey ask be say that kind matter, how Dem dey handle am? OP, everything you’ve learned in this forum is a knowledge that is already instilled in you. As far as a I know, knowledge cannot be transferred and if someone else takes over your account, it does not mean the person will have the same knowledge as you, or a good reputation you’ve built here so far. This is a public forum and also a risky place as it involves many people from different places coming together, reputation is very vital here and when you lose it, you’ve lost everything here already. Because of your good reputation here, I can decide to trade with you but when it’s bad, I won’t think twice on whether to trade with you or not because I won’t. You can inherit the account but you can’t inherit the knowledge the deceased must have gathered so far here, so it is better you start on building yourself in the forum instead of using and impersonating someone’s account.Cases like this has already taken place before  and such new user’s taken over the original user’s account are advised to open an account on their own name and build the reputation themselves, if not the account will be tagged to know that the account have changed hand any they they should trade with caution with such account.
